item.title: The 'Why' of Engineering
item.description: Start with the ‘Why’ I want to start off with a simple yet strong idea. Why you do something is more important than what you do The first time I heard this was in a TED talk by Simon Sinek. He speaks about a common pattern in all the great inspirers. They all started with “why” they did what they did. At first, I thought this was just another leadership talk that you find on the internet.
